TopicTitle: How to make a voting poll on a thread that is already active

Articles.Content:
i am trying to set up a voting poll on a thread but it says it can only be done on a new thread

Please Help
Hmm. You should be able to do it from the Thread Tools menu... if not, let me know what you want in the poll and I should be able to put it up for you.

Hmm. You should be able to do it from the Thread Tools menu... if not, let me know what you want in the poll and I should be able to put it up for you.

oh i did not know that...

found it thanks vexx32
